/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, is lined with lush green trees that add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds that add depth to the expansive view. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a vibrant light.
